1.content:
It was a sunny happy day in a big city someplace around the world. That was until the giant baby itself showed up and began wreaking havoc.

(Now then the next parts are up to you to decide what he or she wears)
1.title: Introductions.

choices: Have the citizens feed me or else
11.content:
It was just another typical summer day in downtown New York City as everyone was going about their business until everything came to a grinding halt as an earthquake feeling rocked the city itself as loud heavy footsteps could be heard coming towards them.

As everyone was trying to figure out what was going on at that moment, that's when it happened as everyone couldn't help but look up in shock and awe at a 50 ft tall bald headed rugrat wearing nothng but a white Godzilla sized huggies diaper who was practically looming over them in this case myself.

Now what was i going to do next?
11.title: Boy

choices: we go on a rampage and take over the city
we grow bigger and take over the country
115.content: I shouted in my giant baby voice "The time has come for babies to wule the world." Suddenly, all the babies in New York city started shooting up to my size. Their diapers grew with them but other clothing did not. "Haha, now we awe biggew than any gwon-up."
115.title: giant baby takeover

choices: Made all the babies on Earth gigantic and invulnerable
Intimidated mankind with a show of her power
1153.content: If you thought that was unbelievable, you haven't seen anything yet! Next, I raised my hands to the heavens and shouted: "Behowd, ouw omnipotent diapew goddess, Diapiew, has come!" As I shouted this, an ENORMOUS baby girl descended from the sky surrounded by light! She towered 50 miles tall and wore a gold baby bikini over a platinum diaper. She also wore a fancy crown and carried a scepter that would have cost more than King Tuts sarcophagus if it had been normal sized. To complete her deific appearence, she had 20 angel wings. This was Diapiel, the so-called goddess of infantilism that magical babies hidden among humanities children had awaited to bring an end to adult dominance. First she.....
1153.title: something else

11531.content:
With a wave of her great scepter, Diapiel made all the babies on Earth 300 feet tall and immune to every known form of harm! The now-mighty babies rampaged across the world, demanding that adults and older children submit to them or die. People tried to fight back, but it was no use.

Did they give in?
11531.title: Made all the babies on Earth gigantic and invul...

115312.content: What happened to give all the adults a chance?
115312.title: No, something else happened

choices: No, she just wants to help
1153121.content: Is the adult goddess related to Diapiel?
1153121.title: An adult goddess appeared.

choices: The Goddess of Having No Patience With Bloody Kids
11531212.content:
On that dark day when all looked lost, a plague of titanic babies crawled across the face of the Earth and the people did moan and wail and gnash their teeth for the babies did also cry, very very loudly. The multitude of infants filled this sphere with the smell of infant nappies as they crashed about and stuck random large things in their mouths. Parents chased after their giant offspring in shock, while others blamed the parents. Some blamed Nestle. (It was, in fact their fault.) But it didn't change a thing. Nothing could stop the implausible terrors, not bullets (I know! Shooting at babies!), not tanks and nuclear strikes just destroyed what remained of Detroit.

Adultanity was doomed.

Or was it?

From reality beyond comprehension, a universe to which our own is but a single noodle in a college came...
11531212.title: Behold! Cometh the Savior of Non-Babykind!

11532.content:
With a wave of her hand, Diapiel turned all the weapons and motorized vehicles on Earth into baby-related objects! Then she changed the entire planet to look like a toddlers fantasy.

Did the adults and older children surrender to the babies?
11532.title: Intimidated mankind with a show of her power

choices: let them live under baby dominion
trapped them in an pocket dimension inside her diaper
115321.content: Seeing Diapiel's power, the adults and children over 4 surrendered to their new baby overlords! After giving all babies increased size and strength, Diapiel.....
115321.title: The age of babies begins

1153212.content:
The enormous goddess of infantilism pulled open the waistband of her platinum diaper and sucked every human older than 4 inside a pocket diaper dimension! (A/N: In this scenario, neither the babies nor the older people age or die of natural causes) The pocket dimension looked like a city large enough to house all the prisoners and keep them content, but they couldn't reproduce there, and it still felt like a prison.

Do they except their fate?
1153212.title: trapped them in pocket dimension inside her diaper

choices: No, they sought the help of a magical being
115322.content:
They didn't surrender, so Diapiel tryed again to cow humankind by growing big enough to hold the Earth in her hands.

NOW did they surrender?
115322.title: No

1153222.content: What sort of magical being?
1153222.title: No, they sought the help of a magical being

choices: They expose her as a false goddess
11532221.content: Just when things seemed hopeless, an army of teenaged girls riding on flying mythical creatures surrounded Diapiel (they could breathe in space with their magic) and began peppering her with magic blasts!
11532221.title: Magical Girl warriors

115322212.content:
After a few salvos of magic blasts, Diapiel slumped over backwards and appeared defeated! The leader of the magical girls then said: "Ha, a real goddess would have ignored our attacks as if they were nothing, but this magical construct succumbed to them! Now to find out who is behind this." With that, she and some of the other magical girls flew inside the subdued the female titan's mouth.

Inside Diapiel's body, armies of small magical creatures attacked them, but the powerful girls defeated them easily. At the place where the heart would have been in a human, they found.....
115322212.title: They expose her as a false goddess

choices: She gathers some toys for her diaper
She finds some "toys" to play with
She demands everyone makes her more diapers or perish!
12.content: From behind an building appeared Emily. A 2 year old terror. She had medium red hair and was only wearing a white diaper with tinker bell characters on them. She looked down at all the activity and gave out a monster like roar. This was the favorite day for the girl whose parents let her watch Godzilla movies.
12.title: Monster Child

choices: She farts and poops in her diaper
121.content:
Emily started destroying the city stomping on the people and their cars. Emily started enjoying her rampage since her parents let her watch Godzilla movies giggling during her rampage she grabbed twenty people eating them like candy.

What happens next?
121.title: She rampages through the city

choices: She now had real kaiju powers
1211.content: the currently 200 ft. baby girl suddenly burped and doubled in size to 400 ft. Then....
1211.title: Burp power

choices: We begin battling each other across the city itself.
12113.content:
(My point of view)

Yours truly a 400 ft. wide load superhero version of Nephew Wolf A.K.A Super Baby Wolf who appears courtesy of Warner Bros. Animation just happened to notice a 400 ft. girl already wreaking havoc upon the city itself and terrorizing its citizens until I decided to put an end to her reign of terror once and for all by saving the day.

"This looks a job for Super Baby Wolf." I heroically said as I heavily stomped on over to where she was and immediately I confronted her.

"I Super Baby Wolf order you to surrender or else." I said.

"Or else what?" Emily asked angrily.

"Why do they always ask that question?" I asked myself.
12113.title: Another giant baby showed up

1212.content: The tot raised her butt and grunted before the people heard loud, squishy farting. Her diaper quickly filling up and becoming lumpy and warm. All the lunch she ate a few hours ago was currently swarming out of her butt and filling up the diaper with a brown, stinky mess. Emily sighed heavily before leaning over and letting out more disgusting slurry. It only took her a few seconds to fill his diaper to the brim, up to the point where it was beginning to leak with stink poo all over. The citizens of the city exclaimed and looked up at Emily's diaper, which was a lumpy, dark shade of brown.
1212.title: She farts and poops in her diaper

choices: What do these tiny people taste like?
How many can Lucas crush with his feet?
Save some of these tiny people for later.
Lets see if these buildings can hold Lucas's full weight.
13.content:
Lucas, who once seemed like your average 4-year-old boy, was now looming over the city he had lived in when he was small. But now... this cool toy world was his! Just one of his feet equaled the size of a single bus. So he wasn't a real enormous child, but he was really big. Lucas had medium-length dark brown hair, but as he approached the city, he seemed as if he had just woke up from an age-long nap.

He set a single foot on the city's roadway and immediately he felt metal flatten under him. It felt more like styrofoam to him, but as he looked down, it was clearly one of the cool toy cars. These little toy cars seemed to be everywhere... all over the place! Off of every road he could see down, there were cars.

They won't be cars for long... Lucas thought to himself. This thought brought a little grin to the young boy's sleepy face.

The oblivious tiny people in the city's streets and buildings now came to their senses as the footsteps drew closer. They were quickly taken note of by the giant boy. He gained a fast interest in these scurrying little creatures that he once looked up to and called adults. Well, no more! All their own rules... all the fun he had ever wanted to have as a normal boy was put to a halt by these adults. But now that he was bigger... he could show them who the new rule-maker was!

Lucas saw them all staring up at him in shock. Some looked frightened, but most looked completely awestruck by this new mighty boy invading their little perfect establishment. He almost forgot the backpack he had on, how the heck did that grow with him? Oh well, that's not important now. He took the giant backpack off and set it in the road, immediately crushing a couple more cars and bystanders. The sudden crushing movement sent the tiny people into a frenzy, they all started running the opposite direction of his mega child. Unzipping the backpack, he found his pull ups that he wore usually at night when he went to sleep (he still wet the bed quite frequently) and his usual everyday briefs. They had all kinds of different superheroes on them, Batman, Spiderman, you name it. He also found a book of stickers and some crayons. Along with a pair of socks, shoes, some jeans, and some shorts and shirts.

I forgot I was about to leave for a friend's house...

Lucas was a giant boy now, and even had all his favorite toys and clothes. He set the bag aside, knocking the walls inward on a nearby shop. He continued walking, another curious but evil boyish-grin coming across his face. He raised his foot as high as it could go, and brought it down on a group of running pedestrians. Their bodies made a sssqquuuueeellllcccchhhh sound as he mushed them down into the sidewalk's concrete. He was able to crush about 7 or 8 people in one stomp.

This is going to be so much fun...
13.title: Lucas

choices: He Farts and Burps as he grows bigger.
131.content: Luke started to grab about at least thirty people and started to eat them as he found out that they truly have an amazing taste.
131.title: What do these tiny people taste like?

choices: Removed his clothes and went on a rampage.
1311.content: By the time Lucas finished off all the people downtown, he was twice the height of the tallest human building! He then.....
1311.title: Behemoth baby

1312.content: Lucas saw a group of about 50 people nearby that were running from him. He smiled and started walking after them. As he caught up with them, he ripped off a large chunk of a nearby building and placed it in front of the fleeing people. They were now trapped between a building and a toddler's feet. Lucas smiled evilly at his victims and started to take off his clothes until he was wearing nothing but his white briefs. He turned around and the bugs screamed when they found out what was going to happen to them. They saw a massive pair off briefs coming at them. Then there was a loud squish as the people become blood on Lucas' underwear. He even crushed the building that trapped the little people. He just smiled at the fact he had killed dozens of people. He yelled out " This city is now my toy." What does he do next?
1312.title: He sits on them.

choices: He woke up bigger and with new powers (his stuff grows with him)
He woke up and saw another giant his age
He dreamed he was a god-like monster
133.content: Lucas got down on his hands and knees and played with dozens of cars and vehicles as if they were toys. It was panic in the streets! Eventually, Lucas got tired and fell asleep for the night.
133.title: Lets play with some cars.

1331.content: When Lucas woke up, he was the size of the Sears Tower! Somehow, he knew he now had.....
1331.title: He woke up bigger and with new powers (his stuf...

1332.content:
Lucas woke to the sound of ponding footsteps. When he stood up he found his four year old best friend Mike walking towards him, causing panic down below, yet he wasn't destroying any of the buildings. The thing he was crushing were several cars that were abandoned. He stopped when he was standing next to Lucas. They were both standing at 200 feet tall.

(From Mike's point of view)

I was sitting around my house wearing a pull-up and matching shirt and pants with batman characters on it. Then I felt a tingling feeling inside my tummy. I started slowly growing. I hit my head on the ceiling and then I just smashed through the roof. After a minute of growing I finally stopped but mine and a neighbors house was completely destroyed. My clothes grew with me. I sat on the rubble that used to be my house and looked around the city. That was when I noticed my best friend sleeping in downtown. I started walking over and noticed that he woke up and was standing. He smiled when he saw that I had grown as well, and I smiled back. I was standing next to him and we both looked around the city.

Mike: I didn't wake you up did I?
Lucas: You did, but it doesn't matter. I'm just happy to see that you are a giant like me.
Mike: Now that I am here how about we play with this city.
Lucas: That sounds like a great idea but first let me change into something more comfortable.

(Back to main POV)

Lucas started taking his clothes off and tossed them aside. He was standing in nothing but his undies. He then went over to his backpack and took out a blue pull-up. He took off his undies and slipped on his pull-up. He turned over to Mike and told him to take his clothes off. He did just that until he was wearing nothing but his own pull-up. Now the city is the toy of two four-year olds in nothing but their pull-ups.
1332.title: He woke up and saw another giant his age

13323.content:
Lucas and Mike started walking through the city. They could hear the street crack with each step. They can also hear the occasional squish as little people were crushed beneath them. Then Lucas heard a growl coming from his stomach. He looked over at Mike and said, "I got to go potty." Mike asked, Can you hold it for a little bit?" Mike looked down at all the little bugs at his feet with an evil smile on his face. They all started screaming and tried to run away. Mike just laughed and told Lucas, "isn't it funny how the wittle bugs are twying to run away." Mike and Lucas started walking after the fleeing crowd. It only took a few steps to for the two of them to step in front of, and trap, 100 little people. They reached down and picked up all the little bugs in their hands. Each hand now had 25 screaming bugs in it. Lucas already knew why Mike asked him to wait. Lucas opened up the front of his pull-up and deposited the bugs from his right hand into it. Then he let the waistband snap back into place, and he started giggling at the feeling of having bugs squirming in his pull-up. Then he w=used his right hand to open up the back of his pull-up and deposited the bugs in his left hand into it.

Lucas looked at Mike and told him that he had to go now. He started to squat down into his potty position. Unknown to Lucas, he was squatting on top of an apartment building filled with people. He started grunting and the little bugs in the back of his pull-up looked up and screamed. They saw a massive turd pointing out of his but. Several more turds crashed into his pull-up, killing everyone. The surviving bugs in the front of his pull-up were screaming as they watched the others die. Lucas wasn't finished yet. He unleashed a torrent of pee into the front. The little people screamed as they were soaked in Lucas's urine. They were struggling to stay above the line of pee. It was futile and they all eventually drowned. Lucas and Mike looked down at his bulging and soaked pull-up and smiled at each other. Lucas sat down and crushed the building beneath his soiled diaper. There was also a loud squish as the turds and all 50 bugs were squished in his diaper. The crotch was stained red from blood.

Lucas looked at Mike and asked, "What are you going to do with the 50 toys in your hands. Surprised, Mike looked down at his hand and remembered that he had bugs in his hands. "I forgot I had those toys in my hands." Lucas told Mike that after he was done playing with the little bugs, he really need his pull-up changed. What does Mike do with the little bugs?
13323.title: stinky pull-up(s)

134.content:
Lucas decided on keeping some of these tiny people (bugs to him) for himself. It seemed almost fit to his giant scenario that he was wearing his favorite khaki cargo shorts, and as anybody knows, cargo shorts have multiple pockets. He got right to work with scooping handfuls of these bugs up and dumping them head first into his pockets. Ignoring their pleas to be let go and put them down, he continued to happily fill his pockets up. Every now and then he would accidentally squeeze a few a little bit to hard and they would pop and explode in between his fingers. When that happened, they left a bloody, oozing streak running down his fingers and dripping to the ground below. Seeing how careless Lucas was sent the people into a fleeing frenzy.

After a while, as he knew what would happen, his pockets were completely stuffed with these little buggers. He even kept a few in the front pocket on his shirt. But now, he had run out of space. As of now, he would say the most unfortunate ones were the ones stuffed so apathetically in his back pockets. Whenever Lucas decided to take a little break and have a seat, they would surely meet a butt like weight fate. After a couple minutes of thought and searching over his body for some loose space to stuff some more of the little people into, he could only think of one place left.

My undies! Lucas thought to himself, this brought another one of those evil-boyish grins to his young face.

Hmm, but should I stuff them down the front, or the back?
134.title: Save some of these tiny people for later.

1342.content: Lucas dropped his tiny captives down the back of his undies, right between his buttcheeks!
1342.title: Back

13422.content: 2-year-old Wanda was once a normal baby, but now she is 500 feet tall! What's more, she wants to make more babies her size so that babies can rule the world and make all men, women, and children older than them serve babies. Wanda wears a sparkly pink dress over a plain pink diaper, and a toy tiara that grew with her. She has shoulder-length red hair and blue eyes. She can grow bigger if she wants, but her maximum height is 10,000 feet unless something gives her more power.
13422.title: Giant Princess Baby, a World Ruled by Babies

choices: Make giant babies and tell the adults to wear diapers
Change reality so she is queen and rules over a diaper wearing world
134221.content: One day Wanda a 2 year old was placed in a daycare that was built over a toxic waste dump. She drank some of the toxic water and gained cosmic powers to change her size and reality to her will. She was a girl who wanted to see all people in diapers and she knew exactly how to do that...
134221.title: Princess Wanda

choices: They grew bigger and took over the world
1342211.content: Wanda grew herself and 5 of her friends to 500 feet tall and told them it was time for babies to rule the world. Then.....
1342211.title: Make giant babies and tell the adults to wear d...

13422111.content: Amanda and he 'little' friends went to Washington DC and ordered the president to relinquish his power. "Now since I am queen of the United States I will make all the adults wear diapers and make our economy based around diapers" Amanda said. She then waved her arms and
13422111.title: They took over the U.S.A.

choices: Follow the POV of a US citizen
Amanda makes more changes to her diaper country
134221111.content:
All the sudden all the diaper factories in the united states became gigantic if they werent already. They were the size of skyscrapers lying down. "Now that we can create diapers for everyone. That means that everyone should wear them" Amanda declared...
What happens next?
134221111.title: Diaper factories were made bigger

choices: Diaper factories on a supersized scale
1342212.content:
All the sudden she thought of the reality that she wanted, a world that revolved around diapers! A wave came from inside her head and spread around the world. She thought of a world where she was the queen and ruler of all the adults. She grew to 50 feet tall and made Washington DC her world capital. It had a throne building where the capital building once was. The pentagon became the shape of a diaper and was where the babies would command the baby forces.

What does Amanda change next....?
1342212.title: Change reality so she is queen and rules over a...

choices: Make some babies giant like her.
13422121.content:
The giant baby girl sat her padded butt down on her throne. What a throne it was! It towered over everything building in the city, was a bright pink with unicorns painted on it. Around the front was a nice tray like that one would find on high chair. In front of her was a giant baby bottle, the size of skyscraper with a sea of warm milk sloshing about.

The girl held the bottle in her hands little the sweet milk dribble down her throat, her giant toes wiggling in joy while casting a great shadow over the city of d.c. D.C now standing for Diaper City, fitting name it was. The mint no longer printed money but made countless diapers! There was countless ads for diapers on every street. Every business was now about diapers or something else babyish.

The baby went on drinking as naturally this drinking made her body need to let loose her last bottle worth of milk. So the flood gates open, and that was no joke as if not for the thick giant pink diaper around her waist the whole of DC would have flooded. So her pee splash on the walls of her padding making it damp in places and a bit saggy. However this feeling just made the girl giggled with joy as the nice warm wet feeling was nice to her.

This got her thinking, thinking about how bad adults get it. I mean now there surround by diapers but they are still mostly for babies. With a though in her head a wave of light travel from her to all around the around.In blink of an eye the world changed once more. Every adult's clothes changed, pant legs shrunk, sleeves were sucked into the shirt. Shirt and pants combined and change into onies. Some people clothes just vanished but on all adults were some kind of diaper, diapers of all different designs and looks! Ads of super models showing off the best dresses and such changed to them showing off the newest diaper designs.

Wanda looked down at the adults giggling at her work, as she was quite pleased with how hard they were working. As she plotted her next move she decided to. . .
13422121.title: First she changes the world then her diaper.

choices: Our three heroes set out to save the world.
134221212.content:
As she made some babies become giants and giantesses that would follow her every order, of course what she didn't know was that she grew three babies who of course would rise up to stop her and the other evil giant and giantess babies that were acting under her orders as these three happened to be who everyone was praying and hoping for as these three happen to be an equal force of some sort.

As for who these three giant babies are allow me the story's narrator to introduce to you the three giant babies that'll stop Wanda and her evil group of giant and giantess babies.

First up is the leader of the trio Atomic Baby.

Name: Atomic Baby.
Height: 321 feet tall.
Weight: 126,000 tons.
Alignment: Heroic Good.
Bio: Formerly an ordinary child he transformed into Atomic Baby during an experiment that either went right or wrong when Wanda and the others first appeared, as he also never thought he'd become a giant sized superhero until now.

Next up is the second member of the trio Super Baby.

Name: Super Baby.
Height: 367 feet tall.
Weight: 132,000 tons.
Alignment: Heroic good.
Bio: Super Baby was but an ordinary child until one fateful day as he consumed some highly experimental formula and transformed into Super Baby.

And finally here's the last member of the trio Cyber Baby.

Name: Cyber Baby.
Height: 295 feet tall.
Weight: 180,000 tons.
Alignment: Heroic good.
Bio: As he's an overgrown baby, rumor has it that he was going to be used as a top secret weapon of some sort by his own country's government until he decided he wasn't gonna be used as a top secret weapon of some sort as he escaped on his own, as the very hope and fate of mankind lies in his own hands!

Now what will happen next?
134221212.title: Make some babies giant like her.

choices: Order all adults to act like babies.
Attack more of the world's cities.
1342212121.content:
Wanda stomped around the city happily causing the planet to shake with every step. Many other evil babies were all around her. Our three heroes stepped up to them as they began to speak.

"Play time i-" is all one of them said before being blown back by her massive burp into the ocean. "Boring!" she said as in a flash of light Cyber Baby was still here as he transformed into a giant animated cybernetic teddy bear. The other two didn't fare much better either, as Super Baby now transformed into a bright green kitten and the team's leader Atomic Baby transformed into an animated puppy dog who was still wearing his spandex costume.

It was the rise and fall of the super babies now no one could stop the evil giant babies. Now what will happen next?
1342212121.title: Our three heroes set out to save the world.

choices: Make every adult into adult babies
1342212122.content:
All three of them banded together as they started heading towards the evil queen Wanda's own castle as they were getting ready to take her down, as Wanda looked at the three heroes with a look of pure evil.


"We're here t-" Atomic baby started to speak but Wanda didn't care. She waved her hand and he floated up toward her mouth, struggling as he might his body refused to move an inch as he approached her maw. He slid down easily into her throat. The other stood horrid as the image of him was shown through a bulge traveling down her neck.
Wanda laugh picking the other two up and chucking them into her mouth gulping them down just as effortlessly into bubbling acids of her gut. They were breaking down quickly and soon were no more.

It was an hour later she felt the urge. She crotch down onto a nearby building letting go with atomic fart "Pfffth!" like nuke. Her diaper glowing a bright green as she filled it with what remained of the super babies. She giggled taking her diaper off leaving her bare underside exposed and tossing it far into the sun.

Now that was dealt with, what next for wanda
1342212122.title: Super babies, more like super losers

134222.content: Lavender was once a fairy baby only one inch tall, but now she is 300 feet tall thanks to a strange gem she found! Lavender has blond hair, green eyes, and wings like a painted lady butterfly. She wears only a sparkly purple diaper. Lavender isn't aggressive, but she is playful, and she is thrilled at being the bigger one for a change. Her parents are trying to stop her, but as long as they are normal fairy size, it's an exercise in futility.
134222.title: Giant Fairy Baby

1342222.content: Susy is a 70-foot-tall baby who just turned 3. She is rather obese and is always hungry. Furthermore, the more she eats, the bigger she grows! Susy has red hair and blue eyes and wears a plain white diaper and a pink shirt that doesn't cover her plump belly. She will eat almost anything.
1342222.title: Giant Hungry Baby

choices: A buffet with lots of food and people in it
13422221.content:
It was a peaceful day in the local city. Outside it was fairly warm, but more than a few, puffy, clouds kept everything from getting too hot. All in all, it was a good day to be outside and enjoy the weather and that's just what the people of this city were doing, if they weren't stuck at school or work.

However, little did these poor people know just what a nightmare this day was going to be for them. The good weather, and large numbers of people out and about, had attracted someone else too. While she was only a young girl of 3 years old, everyone who saw her took instant notice of her.

Loud and heavy footsteps announced her approach to all around. However, this wasn't why they stopped to look at her. Was it because of her cute diaper and pink t-shirt? No. Was it because of her cute red hair and sapphire eyes? No. Was it because this cute, little, girl was so fat that her belly bulged off her like a flesh-covered water balloon that showed off her, extra cute, bellybutton to everyone around? Well, that didn't go unnoticed, but it was the fact that this tubby 3 year old was almost 70 feet tall that caused most to worry greatly.

Yes, Susy had arrived in town and people were right to worry. Not only was this giant little girl obese, but she was always hungry too. Even now, Susy's belly rumbled as it hung over her diaper and loomed over the people below. The cute child happily patted her flabby middle with her giant, sausage-like, fingers and began to search for something to eat.

A quick look around showed the supersized, toddler, plumper a few choices for her next snack...
13422221.title: Hungry Susy

13422222.content: Molly is a 300-foot-tall one-year-old who wears a drooled-on pink shirt and a white diaper with Tinkerbell characters on it. Her most unusual feature, however, is that even though the rest of her body looks well away from puberty, she has what appear to be a pair of D-cup breasts! Molly acts like a typical 1-year-old, albeit an enormous one, but she may also have decidedly un-babyish traits.
13422222.title: Different Baby

13423.content: Amanda is an African-American baby who has just turned 3, and now she has gained nigh-omnipotent powers! She has decided to use them to make the cosmos her playground. Amanda can assume any size from normal baby size to the size of 8 billion universes, and can do pretty much anything imaginable. Anything that can stop her should be a major plot point. Amanda always uses her reallity-warping abillities to fix everything when she is done playing, and people are none the wiser. Amanda wears a glowing golden baby bikini over a platinum diaper. She also wears a tiara on her head.
13423.title: Unstoppable Amanda

134231.content: First, how does Amanda gain her powers?
134231.title: Amanda

choices: Reveal the Origin of the Mysterious Candy
1342311.content: One day, Amanda was toddling around her house, when she saw a strange, glowing piece of candy on the floor. It looked more inviting than any other piece of candy she had ever seen. She picked it up, unwrapped it, and ate it. As soon as the piece of candy digested, Amanda somehow knew that she now had powers beyond imagination, and that no one could ever tell her "no" again! Immediatly, Amanda toddled to the door, opened it with her new powers, and went outside. As soon as she was outside, Amanda grew to 60 feet tall! Her clothes and diaper shredded as she grew, but she gained a new outfit: a glowing golden baby bikini over a platinum diaper, and real tiara on her head. "Amanda pway with wittle town!" the giant toddler said happilly.
1342311.title: Mysterious Candy

134232.content:
This baby descended from the sky outside New York City one day, with no clue as to where he came from. He looks mostly human, but he has green skin, purple hair, red eyes, and dragon wings; his most distinctive feature, however, is that he's twice the size of the Empire State Building! He wears only a purple diaper covered with alien symbols. He isn't malicious, but he is mischievous, and likes the idea of having power over grown-ups. He can grow bigger if you want and have any powers you want. You can choose to reveal where he came from, or you can leave that a mystery.

(A/N:Someone please add to this story besides me!)
134232.title: Mysterious Alien Tot

1342322.content:
This 700 foot tall baby boy was released from a tomb in Egypt. He looks mostly like a living Egyptian person, but he is wrapped in bandages and has glowing green eyes. He has various magical powers and can regenerate from most injuries, but is vulnerable to fire. He loves to destroy things and have power over grown-ups.


(A/N: I REALLY need some other people to add to this story!)
1342322.title: Giant Mummy Baby

13423222.content: 2-year-old Anna was just a normal toddler, until she was zapped by a mysterious artifact unearthed by her archeologist father and grew to 100 miles tall! And who knows if that's even the full extent of her transformation? Anna has blond hair and blue eyes and wears a Disney Princesses diaper and a strange crown that appeared on her head when she grew. She can grow bigger if you want and have any powers you want. Writers can choose to reveal the origin of the artifact that grew her, or they can leave that a mystery.
13423222.title: MEGA Baby Girl

134232222.content: 1-year-old Ned is not only 300 feet tall, but he has all the powers of Godzilla! Ned has black hair and blue eyes, and wears only a plain white diaper. He is very hyper and destructive, but he may have a softer side.
134232222.title: Godzilla Baby

1342322222.content: Kone is a 2 year old baby from Japan just moving to USA, but he might as well be the most destructive baby you ever see ever. He is 200ft tall, has black hair and tan skin, and wears a diaper, but he is also a giant robot monster armed with many weapons. Laser eyes, monster roars, atomic breath, poop bombs, and so much more. He is so monstrous, he even always behaves like a giant monster. Destroying and roaring everything in sight. NYC is in for a Robo-Konezilla attack.
1342322222.title: Robot baby!

135.content:
Waist-level buildings weren't common in the city. Most were either above or below his waist. Yet he was able to find one almost equal to his waist. All these clothes he had on would simply get in the way of his playtime involving a currently targeted building. So, he just began stripping out of them. He threw his pants and shirt onto a crowd of fleeing tiny humans. The minuscule people were all smothered out of life under his giant shorts and shirt.

Sucks to be them.

Lucas giggled. He was now ninety percent naked, only in his briefs underwear. His shoes were sitting precariously perched upon another skyscraper, along with his socks stuffed deep inside the shoes. He began to look himself over, head to toe. His chubby belly extended slightly over the tip of the waistband on his undies. A good crowd had formed across the street, they had quit running from his massive figure. They gazed up at his undies and his face. He smiled down at them, and strode slowly to them. The tiny people stared up once more, completely awestruck.

Lucas began squatting down in front of them, his heels wiping out a couple mini-vans below him. He didn't care if any families were inside or not. As he squatted, his brief-covered butt pushed in some roofs of bigger cars, and he even managed to full flatten a couple with his own rear-end. Focusing his attention back to the people in front of him, he reached toward them and picked them all up. He payed no mind to their frightened screaming as he stood back up to his full height. A few threw up all over his hand as the sudden arise in altitude flipped their stomachs. He deposited these morsels onto the roof of the building. He started doing this multiple times, until the roof was filled with these little people. Some up there looked younger than he was, and all the more frightened. Oh well.

Grinning from ear-to-ear, he turned around, and they looked up at his butt in complete dismay, knowing what was to come. They began panicking and running around madly. Some even jumped off the roof to avoid his weight squashing down upon them. As his butt got lower and lower, they screamed louder and louder, not knowing what in the world to do. The time came, and his briefed-butt sat down into its rightful place on the building. Oh the noise they made as he squished them out of existence. The ripping and tearing of flesh as he wiggled his butt back and forth on top of their crushed remains. Bones crackling and blood spurting. He knew he should have put on a pull-up before doing this.
135.title: Lets see if these buildings can hold Lucas'...

1351.content:
The roof of this building was now soaked in bloody squished remains. Lucas could feel some of the blood seeping through the seat of his underwear. Ignoring this, he started feeling the building he was now straddling begin to collapse. Smoke puffed up from the bottom and rose quickly into the atmosphere. People begin to jump from the windows of the building or pour out the front entrance. Floors begin collapsing on top of one another, flattening whoever or whatever is inside on each level.

Eventually, there is practically nothing left of this little structure. It had been completely demolished under a giant 4-year-old boy's butt. Lucas stood up again and brushed off the back of his undies, which now was stained a deep red. These damp briefs will get annoying after a while, so he heads back over to his backpack and pulls out...
1351.title: Continue

13512.content:
He was happy after destroying a building and killing dozens of people. He pulled out a giant blue pull up with superman characters on it. He slipped off his blood stained briefs, and tossed them aside. It landed on top of several people fleeing, squishing them into nothing. Lucas smiled as he had squished several more "bugs" He slipped on his pull up and sat down. Fortunately there was nobody near him. He just looked around the city as all of the people ran away, and giggled. " You bugs are my toys." He then walked over to a group of little bugs.

The bugs were frozen with fear. Lucas just looked at them all and smiled. He shouted, "you bugs will be squished beneath my diaper" The people at his feet screamed and tried to run. Lucas just grabbed a building and put it in front of the fleeing bugs. The people were trapped. Lucas turned around and patted his diapered butt. He said a final goodbye to the people. They screamed as his butt came down on them. There was a loud squish as all the bugs were crushed beneath a four-year old's diapered butt. The last thing they saw was superman characters on his pull up. Lucas sat on the crushed remains, as the back of his diaper had a red maroon stain. Now what does he do?
13512.title: A pull-up.

135121.content:
As Lucas was sitting on the crushed little bugs his stomach rumbled. He yelled out "Got to go poopies." The bugs below him screamed and started running again. Lucas just smiled and started walking after the bugs running. It only took a few steps to step in front of them. Lucas reached down, hearing his pull up crunch, and scooped up about 50 bugs. He lifted them up to his face. "You bugs get to go into my pull up" he yelled, and he shoved them all into the back of his pull up.

The bugs landed right beneath Lucas's butt. His stomach rumbled again, and Lucas yelled out "it's bathroom time." He squatted down onto a nearby skyscraper, crushing several floors. He started grunting and let out a huge fart. The people in the diaper moaned as their noses were assaulted by Lucas's massive fart. Several of them passed out from the smell. Lucas just giggled at his own stink. Hehehe that was vewy stinky. The remaining people looked up and saw a massive turd poke out of Lucas's massive butt. They screamed as the turd crashed down in to the seat of the diaper. Several more massive turds came crashing down, killing everyone inside. Lucas flooded his diaper with his pee. Lucas sat down on his diaper crushing the building beneath him. He also squished his poop against his butt, and the dead people were all crushed into nothing. The back of Lucas's pull up was stained a dark brown and maroon red. The front was completely stained yellow. Now Lucas yelled out for the remaining bugs to change his diaper. The bugs screamed as they had to change a diaper that was twice as big as their houses. Do they change Lucas or not and risk punishment.
135121.title: Stinky Pull up

choices: Defending the city from a giant baby boy
Defending the city from a giant baby girl
She is seen playing on her own island
The military is running tests on her
Babyzilla is (helping the government) by destroying a part of the city
14.content:
She is here to save us all from destruction from the other giant babies in the world from destroying our cities and eating us all down. She stands at 200ft tall with short black hair and wears a diaper with a U-BG symbol on it. Her actual name is Koya, but she is known to the entire world as Ultra-Baby Girl.

Ever since giant babies started attacking our city, the government had to come up with a way of fighting these titanical terrors, so they decide to make their own giant baby. They took a baby name Koya and injected with giant monster DNA, and then their monster was born. She can fire atomic breath from her mouth (here the babies will have exclusive powers) and her intelligence grew along with it to where she can speak well. She then defends the cities from other giant babies, and heck, they even let her have a little bit of giant baby fun as well by letting her act like a monster in some events. She goes under Babyzilla. (note, she can stand on her legs very well) and she roars like a monster alot.

So, what should we see her doing?
14.title: Ultra-Baby Girl

choices: Restart this stuff to your fashion.
142.content:
"Incubation is at 87% give her a dose of Grystalhypztalzine 539, 28 milliliters exactly." Spoke one of the doctors as she presided in the nursery as she gazed down at a large full-length table-sized crib, resting inside was a baby the size of a medium-sized dog and was hooked up to multiple machines and syringes that dripped fluids into her body.

Koya Stalghein... This was my name... That was what I remembered...

"I have the Grystalhypztalzine Ma'am." "Excellent, bring it here." Spoke the doctor as she took the vial from her assistant before injecting the chemicals into the sleeping giant babys' left shoulder.

Koya Stalghein... I was a normal girl... At least I used to be...

"Incubation is 94%, ready to bring her higher-functions online now?" Asked one of the technicians as the doctor removed her glasses to push the long black hair from her eyes as she raised her hand for the go-ahead, "Alright, ready to stimulate EIWP-702, set charge to 23%." "You sure about that boss. I mean, she's just a baby."

Koya Stalghein... I lived a normal childhood... But then...

A surge of energy coursed from the tesla coils that made up the corners of the cribs walls, pulsing their way through the baby as the doctor looked down at her closely with furrowed eyebrows.

...But then...

"Major cerebral activity present in EIWP-702." Spoke the technician as he gauged the monitors around his workstation, "And besides, it was because of babies like her that we've been drawn to this point in human history. Feel lucky that the good doctor here made a donation to the right cause."

...It was them...

"Doctor Stalghein, the EIWP seems to be spiking in activity now. Care to calm it down?" Doctor Stalghein just shot the technician a gristly stare as he backed away from the console in fear before the doctor began to gently reach into the crib and lift her baby girl out, unfazed by the electrical surges passing through both of their bodies as she sat down and cradled the massive baby tenderly while cooing a small song into her ears.

...They killed my dad...

Small tears began leaking from Koyas' eyes as she heard her mother sing to her as she struggled to open her eyes. After a few tries and some coaxing from Doctor Stalghein, Koya sat there gazing lovingly up at her mommy before both of them part-took in a soft kiss. "Good morning, mummy." Sung Koya softly as her mother set her down on the floor to stand upright, "I am ready for a mission now."

...And now...

Koya stood before the massive doors as she glanced up at her mother talking with the 2nd Research Division General before he turned to face her. "The civilian evacuation of Baku, capital city of Azerbaijan has been completed, however the HRDF (Human Reserve Defense Forces) operatives that oversaw the operation are unable to evacuate at this time. Their original LZ was the old State Opera and Ballet Theater, however a large congregation of Jacks have appeared in the area and forced the operatives into the industrial districts and dangerously running low on both ammunition and supplies. You will be dropped from low-altitude into the Lower City, there you will make your way to the HRDFs last-known location, give them the emergency flares to signal us for evac while holding off any and all Jacks and Jills you can find. Do you understand this mission EIWP-702?" Koya just saluted by bringing both hands across her chest and thrusting them forward before opening her fists "Affirmative general." The General grunted before turning his head to nod at one of the scientists as they began to open the large doors. Koya knelt down and picked up a small jacket that she put on, along the left sleeve was the word "Freedom", and on the right sleeve was the word "Death" she then grabbed a suitcase with straps attached to one side as she put it on her back before reaching into the jackets' pocket and pulling out a pair of goggles and a headset that she put on, adjusting her diaper and putting on her boots, she ran out the door when it was open and fell through the air towards the city of Baku below the cloudline.

...I'll kill them...

The clouds blew past the infant as she completely saw the smoking cityscape below. along with giant Baby boys and girls trudging through city blocks and a number of them clambering at the tall buildings.

...I'll kill them...

As she fell near the Palace of Shirvanshahs, a few Jacks took notice of her descent as they rushed towards her eager to sate their appetite. Koya brought her thumb to her mouth as she opened it to reveal several small teeth popping through her gums.

"...I'LL KILL THEM!!"

With a swift bite and a gush of blood into Koya's mouth, a large bolt of lightning shot out all around her as well as smoke before a massive naked muscular baby girl fell from and crashed into the ground before delivering a bone-shattering punch directly towards a Jack that sought to sink his teeth into her neck; sending him flying off into the Caspian Sea. glancing around, Koya saw a Jack leap from one of the nearby buildings in her direction, only for Koya herself to go onto her hands and deliver a powerful kick into the Jacks' neck before he was sent airborne by it and crashing several miles inland, a deafening CRACK! followed as she righted herself only to look down to see that her femur snapped and was sticking out of her leg, within a few seconds, the bone easily reset itself and the gash in her leg instantly healed itself.

I'll end them all... I shall clear this world of their kind just the way they're trying to do with us. And so long as I continue to draw breath, I will never stop fighting them.

[[Author's Note: this was partially-inspired by Attack on Titan, you can continue with a personal choice, or stick with this variant: Reset Button Enabled for Future Additions, just consider this a more mature variant]]
142.title: Koya

choices: Does the baby put you in it's mouth
Does the baby put you in its diaper
Does the baby put you in its ear
15.content: You're just a normal citizen until suddenly, a giant baby picks you up.
15.title: Be a normal sized citizen

choices: Reveal the story behind all this
152.content: The 200 ft. baby boy put you in his diaper. You saw that their were many other people in the huge diaper also! You REALLY hoped the enormous boy didn't need to go.
152.title: Tiny collecting

choices: Follow a baby who has advanced to the next stage
1523.content: The baby, whose name was Tommy, was a normal little boy until a week ago, when he and many other 1-3 year old children mysteriously vanished from their beds (their parents/guardians were none the wiser). These babies all had something in common: they all had fantasies of being big and powerful! The babies found themselves hovering before an enormous figure sitting on a throne. Even sitting, the figure was over 100 miles tall! It seemed to be a baby like them, only instead of a human, it was an anthropomorphic gold dragon with 12 wings of rainbow fire. The titanic being wore a purple diaper decorated with strange golden symbols, and it had a crown and scepter that would have cost more than any human work of art even if they had been normal-sized. All the babies should have been scared, but instead they felt great joy and wonder! "I know you want to be big and powerful, and I can make it so. I can make you giants for a short period of time and let you fly to my realm when you're awake. If you collect tiny grown-ups while you are giants and bring them to me, I will grant you ever increasing size and power." Normally, children this age would not have understood such language, but somehow, they did, and they agreed.
1523.title: Reveal the story behind all this

choices: Follow the people in the playpen world
15231.content: Once he had collected 500 adults in his diaper, Tommy took to the sky. As he reached the thermosphere, he conjured a portal and flew through to the giant dragon baby's realm. "I brought some grown-ups!" he said to his master. "Good, place them in the playpen world." said the god-like tot. Tommy flew over to a playpen 10,000 miles on a side that contained what looked like a flat version of an Earth-like planet! He placed them in a futuristic-looking village with some other people. "This is your new home" he told them. As a reward, Tommy was grown to 400 feet and given enhanced strength and heat-vision.
15231.title: Follow Tommy and his captives

15233.content: After bringing hundreds of grown-ups to the giant dragon baby, Jack towered a whopping 5 miles tall and had great angelic wings and the proportionate powers of Superman! His wings also let him sync with cosmic forces. With his new powers he decided to.....
15233.title: Super giant Jack

152331.content: Jack flew to New York City and bellowed in his titanic voice: "I want all you little grown-ups to worship me and be submissive to toddlers, or I'm going to destroy you all!" Just to show he could do it, Jack slapped the ground lightly and caused a huge earthquake. The people.....
152331.title: Subjugate adults

choices: Fast forward to when the throne is built.
Follow another growing fat giant baby monster or already fat giant baby monster.
1523311.content: The people, Wowed by Jack's size and strength, gave in to his demands. He ordered them to build an enormous throne for him and bring him offerings of oatmeal and candy. He also made them give any kid his age whatever they wanted.
1523311.title: Gave in

15233112.content:
Meanwhile, another growing fat giant baby in this case a 1 month old in other words, yours truly was growing larger and gaining weight.

I was but a fat little giant baby boy who was supposed to arrive at a castle in a far far away land, but unfortunately ended up at a normal sized family's home as they were expecting their normal sized child to be delivered.

As for wearing clothes or diapers, i didn't have to wear them because i could be free and also because i was a fat little bare butt naked giant baby boy as well.

I had developed a healthy appetite for baby formula, as it slowly made me grow bigger and fatter whenever I had any baby formula at any time.

Now what will happen next?
15233112.title: Follow another fat giant baby.

info.brief_description: The raw destructive power of a giant baby is unleashed upon the world once again.
info.description:
Once again a giant baby is unleashed upon the unsuspecting world itself.
Rules:
The giant baby can be a boy or girl and wear anything.
The giant baby can do whatever they want to.
The giant baby can be any size you want.
No cussing or using any cuss words at all.
I reserve the right to edit or delete any chapter that violates the no cussing rule.
